DOC.brief_summary: Up 60 subject enrol . Enrolled subject receive one Ulthera® treatment face neck . Follow-up visit occur 90 180 day post-treatment . Study image obtain pre-treatment , immediately post-treatment , follow-up visit .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Face Neck With Lower Ulthera System Energy Settings
DOC.detailed_description: This trial prospective , single-site , double-blinded , randomize , split-face design . Subjects randomized one three treatment group , receive treatment use different energy level . Global Aesthetic Improvement Scale score patient satisfaction questionnaire obtain .
DOC.criteria: Male female , age 30 65 year . Subject good health . Skin laxity face neck Presence active systemic local skin disease may affect wound healing . Severe solar elastosis . Excessive subcutaneous fat face neck . Excessive skin laxity face neck . Significant scar area treat . Open wound lesion area treat . Severe cystic acne area treat .
